Title: Establishes a task force on pandemic learning loss in New York state; and provides for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
Summary: Establishes the task force on pandemic learning loss in New York state to assess the impact of remote learning on children's progess in various disciplines; requires a report; provides for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof.
ActClause: AN ACT to establish a task force on pandemic learning loss in New York state; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
